import React from'react';import{Document,Page,View,Text,Canvas,Image,Font,StyleSheet}from'@react-pdf/renderer';//custom CSS / variables
import'../../css/pdf.css';import*as CardEditorConstants from'./CardEditorConstants.js';//import and register font
import OpenSansLight from"../../css/OpenSans-CondLight-webfont.ttf";Font.register({family:'Open Condensed Light',fontStyle:'normal',fontWeight:'normal',src:OpenSansLight});//styles for actual the PDF document/file
var styles=StyleSheet.create({page:{width:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions.width,height:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions.height,display:"block",position:"relative"},view:{display:"inline-block",position:"relative",height:"100%",width:"100%"},image:{objectFit:"cover",height:"100%"},canvas:{width:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions.width,height:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions.height/2,display:"block",position:"absolute",bottom:0},text:{fontSize:25,color:"red",fontFamily:'Open Condensed Light',position:"absolute",zIndex:0,left:0,bottom:0,margin:"auto",padding:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions.padding}});//used to paint the shadow background canvas
function paintShadowBackground(painter,availableWidth,availableHeight){console.log(painter);// Create a linear gradient
var grad=painter.linearGradient(0,0,availableWidth,availableHeight);console.log(grad);painter.rect(0,0,availableWidth,availableHeight);painter.fill(grad);}//create a PDF document and use props to change the inside text
function PDFDocument(props){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Document,{class:"PDFDocument",style:styles.document},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Page,{style:styles.page,size:CardEditorConstants.PDFDimensions},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(View,{style:styles.view},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Image,{src:props.image,style:styles.image}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Canvas,{style:styles.canvas,paint:paintShadowBackground}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Text,{style:styles.text},props.name))));}export default PDFDocument;
